uk.ac.aber.dcs.slj11.wordplay.datastruct.graph
Class AbstractGraph<Key>

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.aber.dcs.slj11.wordplay.datastruct.graph.AbstractGraph<Key>
Type Parameters:
Key - The type of the key used to reference nodes
Direct Known Subclasses:
WordLadderGraph
public abstract class AbstractGraph<Key>
extends java.lang.Object

Generic implementation of a graph data structure using an adjacency list to store a set of keys which point to a node object, which in turn has a set of keys listing a given nodes neighbours.

Author:
Samuel Jackson (slj11@aber.ac.uk)
